Html:
Hi guess I've created a simple demo app using the Agility Pack at:

http://www.codeproject.com/KB/cs/ProgressViewModel.aspx

http://www.codeproject.com/KB/WPF/MultiProgressViewModel.aspx

Just thought this might be interesting to be included on your Documentation page and in your own documentation.

I also have a question about performance. I have used the Agility Pack to parse out the TITLE of mutliple HTML files

via XPath. Is this implementation the best way of doing this with the HTML Agility Pack or is there yet another faster

way of doing this?
